WorkItem.ClosedComment: I fixed this a bit ago, but it was mixed in with some patch changes for 3.3.3. Should be in the next build.
WorkItem.Description:
Was just messing with the ICC crazy buffs and noticed that the buffs didn't increase my health (damage works fine). I went and found it in the code and discovered that the calculation for BonusHealthMultiplier is being effectively nullified by Floor(), meaning you need a BHM of at least 100% (o.O) to see any changes.
Â 
Fix included. ^^
